I watched it yesterday but I don't get why everyone is so excited about this movie. A lot of parts were quite boring. It's still a good movie obviously but Casino Royale was much much better than this.
Touted as one of the finest bond film, but turns out so underwhelming that i couldn't care less when M died. No intrigue, no suspense, no gadgets. And the bond girl? Gimme a break..

Spoiler: M is actually Bonds real mother. Then she dies after throwing the Queen down an airshaft.

"I am your mother James. Search your feelings, you know it to be true! Join me and together we shall rule Brittain like mother and son."

@hashtagnwo:

The subtitles are there for people like me, who have auditory processing disorder. It makes me unable to process what people say, no matter how many times someone repeats it to me.

I also have some deafness from working around heavy machinery for a long time.

Don't assume that everyone has 100% hearing like you do, cupcake.
